title: Charming French Countryside Escape on the River Seine with Indoor & Outdoor Pools
description: Find a peaceful countryside escape hidden along the banks of the Seine River with a tranquil stay at Club Wyndham Normandy. Set in the small but picturesque village of Connelles, uncover this beautiful riverside chateaux just a short drive from Rouen - a historic hub of cultural sites, castles and cathedrals. Within the property itself, relax as you please with access to the sparkling indoor or outdoor pool, invigorating sauna and playground for the young ones.
